page.title: 08Opening of Ollerton Complex
page.content: The Official Opening Day of the {Dukeries Complex}started appropriately with a large choir of Ollerton and District Primary School children who stole the show with their beautiful singing of a Spring Anthem composed by Malcolm Bevan and David Allsop. This was followed by a speech by Bill Morris, Chairman of Notts.County Council who praised Councillor Stella Smedley for being the person primarily responsible for making the Dukeries Complex a reality. There then followed,after slight technical problems, a slide show of the Dukeries Complex. Councillor Smedley made the opening address and then unveiled a plaque to officially open the Complex. A musical finale played by the Dukeries Band ended the proceedings.
